content.description: Union of **Phiera Der Tuphello** and **Eight The Sparrow**

fields.name: Notes
fields.value:
Unlocked by Getting both **Der Tuphello** and **Eight The Sparrow** to level 8. Combined via a chest with **Tiragisu**. Frees up a weapon slot
Scales with revives, One extra beam per revive.

content.title: Phieraggi
